page.title: 07Education.
page.content: Traditionally education was held in great respect in rural Aberdeenshire. Today, education is an important source of employment and stimulation in the Inverurie area. The block based aroung Burnhervie is in the catchment area for Kellands Primary School in Inverurie. This is a modern award winning school in a heavily forested site of several acres. Pupils from the block are bussed in and out to school each day. Secondary school pupils, those aged over 11, travel each day to Inverurie Academy, the senior school in the area. A very small part of the block to the south around Keithney, lies inside the catchment area for Alehousewells Primary and Kemnay Academy.
